D

Deck - Class in qwirkle
A deck where all tiles are stored
Deck() - Constructor for class qwirkle.Deck
Creates a deck with 108 Tiles Every Tile 3 times
deepcopy() - Method in class qwirkle.Board
copy's the current board
deleteTiles(String) - Method in class qwirkle.Player
Used by the client to delete tiles from his hand This is necessary because the client does not delete his tiles when he sends his move to the server He deletes the tiles when the server says the move is valid
determineMove(Board) - Method in class qwirkle.ComputerPlayer
the method that determines what a computerplayer will do in a move (except for the first move) It will first collect all possible places where a tile can be placed After that, the AI will try to place one Tile on every possible place, test the move and save the score After all places and all tiles have been tried, the method returns the move with the best score THIS AI ONLY PLACES ONE TILE AT A TIME
determineMove(Board) - Method in class qwirkle.HumanPlayer
asks the humanPlayer for input to get a new Move
determineMove(Board) - Method in class qwirkle.Player
gets a new move from either ComputerPlayer or HumanPlayer
drawHand() - Method in class qwirkle.Deck
Draw an entire hand from the deck
drawTile() - Method in class qwirkle.Deck
Gets one tile from the deck
